PATIENT_ID: TEST_DEEP_SSI_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-15 12:00:00
Patient underwent exploratory laparotomy for blunt abdominal trauma.
Operative report documented splenectomy performed.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-01 10:00:00
Patient returned within 30 days of procedure with wound complications.
Deep soft tissue infection involving the fascia noted.
Fascial dehiscence with purulent drainage from deep incision.
Deep abscess identified on imaging.
Surgeon diagnosis: deep SSI requiring washout.
